Title: Artisan's Supply: Salt Deposits
Description:
Are ye looking for work, miner?

I was talkin' to Haephesta an' she says the Artisan's Consortium is needin' salt for their customers.

Noo I'd do it meself, but, well, I dinna want to.

Be a pal and fetch 'em for 'er, eh?
ObjectivesText: Deliver 5 Salt Deposits to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver 5 Salt Deposits to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
CompletionText: How can the Artisan's Consortium help you today?
